quests.desc: Welcome to TextWorld! Pick up the plant from the floor of the parlor.
commands: unlock Microsoft limited edition hatch with Microsoft limited edition latchkey
unlock Microsoft limited edition hatch with Microsoft limited edition latchkey

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
This might come as a shock to you, but you've just stumbled into a bedroom.

 You can make out a bed. [if there is something on the s_0]You see [a list of things on the s_0] on the bed. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]The bed appears to be empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a steam room. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You see [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] trunk close by.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_0]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] What a letdown! The trunk is empty![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a restroom. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 You make out [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] case, which looks standard, in the corner.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The case contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You see a board. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the board. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a workshop. An usual kind of place.

 You can make out a suitcase.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The suitcase is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You smell an intriguing smell, and follow it to an armchair. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the armchair. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You're now in the office.

 You can make out a shelf. The shelf is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_3] On the shelf you make out [a list of things on the s_3]. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You arrive in a study. A standard kind of place. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 You make out [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] portmanteau right there by you.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The portmanteau contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You make out a toolbox.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The toolbox contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You see [if c_5 is locked]a locked[else if c_5 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] standard looking cabinet nearby.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You arrive in a bar. A standard kind of place.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the north.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
You are in a pantry. An usual one. You can barely contain your excitement.



There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a chamber.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading north. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in an attic.

 You can make out a counter. Why don't you take a picture of it, it'll last longer! [if there is something on the s_4]On the counter you see [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. This always happens![end if] You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a stand. The stand is normal.[if there is something on the s_5] On the stand you see [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] However, the stand, like an empty stand, has nothing on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] Microsoft limited edition hatch leading south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a bedchamber.

 You can make out a dresser. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best?[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_6]. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You see a mantle. You can't really describe the mantle besides that it's typical. [if there is something on the s_6]You see [a list of things on the s_6] on the mantle.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]However, the mantle, like an empty mantle, has nothing on it.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
You've entered a parlor.

 You can make out a box.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The box contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The box is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading south. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a playroom. An ordinary one.

 You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a desk. The desk is normal.[if there is something on the s_7] On the desk you can see [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] But the thing is empty, unfortunately. You think about smashing the desk to bits, throwing the bits into the garbage, etc, until you get bored.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading north. There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a studio.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a washroom.

 You make out a table. The table is standard.[if there is something on the s_8] On the table you see [a list of things on the s_8].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage. This always happens![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You are in a shower. A normal kind of place. You begin to take stock of what's here.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: salon
infos.desc:
You have fallen into a salon. Not the salon you'd expect. No, this is a salon.

 You make out a chest. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] The chest is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You scan the room for a recliner, and you find a recliner. [if there is something on the s_9]On the recliner you see [a list of things on the s_9].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
You are in a kitchenette. An ordinary kind of place. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
You arrive in a recreation zone. A standard kind of place.

 You smell an awful smell, and follow it to a bed stand. [if there is something on the s_10]You see [a list of things on the s_10] on the bed stand.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10]But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You've entered a cubicle.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] Microsoft limited edition hatch leading north. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading south.

infos.name: door
infos.desc: it's a grand door [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.desc: The hatch looks commanding. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: Microsoft limited edition hatch
infos.desc: The Microsoft limited edition hatch looks hefty. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: gateway
infos.desc: it's an imposing gateway [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: trunk
infos.desc: The trunk looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: case
infos.desc: The case looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.desc: The toolbox looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.desc: The dresser looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: The passkey is surprisingly heavy.

infos.desc: The Microsoft limited edition latchkey is cold to the touch

infos.desc: The plant appears to be to fit in here

infos.desc: The cd is dirty.

infos.desc: The board is undependable.

infos.name: bed stand
infos.desc: The bed stand is durable.

walkthrough: unlock Microsoft limited edition hatch with Microsoft limited edition latchkey

objective: Hey, thanks for coming over to TextWorld! Please pick up the plant from the floor of the parlor.
